original_text: In that day, saith the Lord, will I assemble her that halteth, and I will gather her that is driven out, and her that I have afflicted;
korean_text: 여호와께서 말씀하시되 그 날에는 내가 저는 자를 모으며 쫓겨난 자와 내가 환난 받게 한 자를 모아

sentences.original_text: In that day, saith the Lord
will I assemble her that halteth
and I will gather her that is driven out
and her that I have afflicted
